Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Tonight is our Y2-3 production of Aladdin, please remember the following:
*All Y2-3 students will remain in school at the end of the day today, eat dinner here and perform in the show at 6.30pm.
*All Y2-3 students must be collected by a known adult, from their classrooms, at 7.45pm tonight.
Tomorrow night is our Y4-6 production of Aladdin, please remember the following:
*All Y4-6 students will remain in school at the end of the day on Thursday, eat dinner here and perform in the show at 6.30pm.
*All Y4-6 students must be collected by a known adult, from their classrooms, at 7.45pm tomorrow night.
We look forward to performing for you in our 2013 Primary production of Aladdin!
Kind regards,
Jude Schroeder Production Director The British School of Guangzhou World Class Education
